mpack_file.description: Specify the path for management pack to be installed/upgraded

mpack_url.description: Specify the url to download the mpack

proxy_url.description: The proxy chain if you need download the mpack. For exemple https://proxy.domain.com:8080

proxy_user.description: The proxy user if you need download the mpack

proxy_password.description: The proxy password if you need download the mpack
